players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia; let's vote him out."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is mafia. Vote him out."
You: "I suspect Charlie is mafia; he was too quick to accuse me. Diana, your claim seems suspicious."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Bob is mafia. Vote Bob."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. I investigated him. He knows I'm detective, so his claim of Charlie is a lie. Vote Bob."
You: "I suspect Charlie is mafia; he was quick to accuse me. Diana, your claim seems off. Vote Charlie."
